name: June (itch) (Loki)
description:
June is a short psychedelic horror story. Immerse yourself in the unique experience of an unconventional horror game, a game that breaks all expectations.The action takes place in the Victorian home of a famous painter. Gameplay - about 15+ minutes.

The pictures I used in the game are by the following authors - Poussin, Nicolas (1594-1665), Bryullov, Karl Pavlovich  (1799-1852)

WASD - Move

MOUSE - Look

LeftMouse - Interact

Right mouse - Zoom

The size of the game is 5+ gigabytes or 2+ gb archive (yes, the game weighs a lot, but in return you get great graphics), so the archive will contain a link to google disk, where the archive with the game is stored.

Recommended configurations

 GPU - GeForce GTX 1080 ti 

CP - intel i5+

Ram - 8gb

13371337ddd@gmail.com - contact mail

Warning! Highly not recommended for persons suffering from epilepsy! P.S  Once you've found the heart, don't immediately leave the room with the sculpture and canvases, the scene may not load!
